name: Baragoth
description:
Baragoth awaits you, your presence is strong, he's enthralled by you.
You've been cursed. Can it be broken?
Maybe, but you can try one thing, find all of his spirits.
Failure to do so will result in being consumed.
Or could this just be a dream? 

This short game was made to go along side the book 'The Over Bridge' which you can find on amazon.

Link:
https://www.amazon.com.au/Over-Bridge-Deep-Arya-ebook/dp/B07ZXHDLCD/ref=sr_1_3?c...
